title: 24 ways to stay safe – and stylish – on your travels
text:
Herno recycled crispy nylon Globe parka, £540

The Road Less Travelled by M Scott Peck, £10.99, waterstones.com 

Chaos leather Classic Font iPhone case, £185, and metal zip lanyard, £90

Mostly Heard Rarely Seen quilted nylon hoodie, £388, farfetch.com

BioEco Me freestanding bamboo toothbrush with travel case, £5

Alessi thermoplastic resin Food à Porter lunch pot, £52.80, finnishdesignshop.com 

AirPop Airknit Active+ smart mask with Halo sensor, £150

LastTissue by LastObject six reusable organic cotton tissues in silicone case, £18

UMA Pure Calm Wellness Oil, £68, cultbeauty.co.uk 

Haan refillable hand sanitiser, £5.95, and refill pouch, £12.95, beyondliving.co.uk 

LARQ self-cleaning Bottle PureVis water bottle, £95

Monse cargo-pocket cropped cotton trousers, £686, farfetch.com

Kinfill biodegradable multi-surface cleaner, £22.50

Chanel pre-owned multi-pocket padded jacket, £2,444, farfetch.com

PhoneSoap wireless phone charger and sanitiser, $99.95

HyTensil hygienic travel cutlery set, £14.99

3.1 Phillip Lim antibacterial Fuze Biotech The Essential Parka, £315

Clark's Botanicals hand sanitiser, £8

Antler lie-flat Stirling holdall, £185

Stone Island wind-resistant Reflective Grid Lamy-TC parka, £1,150

Gucci GG Econyl Off The Grid backpack, £1,540

Rimowa x Chaos luggage tag, £90, rimowa.com

Lumily UV Sanitiser Wand, £95
